## screen2d() function

Constructs a orthographic projection matrix for using 2D screen coords, with origin in the top-left corner of the viewport. If a WebGL context is given, the its `drawingBufferWidth` &amp; `drawingBufferHeight` values are used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function screen2d(width: number, height: number): GLMat4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | <code>number</code> |  |
|  height | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`GLMat4`
